Author: aybeeplus
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VENTANA :: P2P ANTI-PIRACY SEARCH & DISTRIBUTION PLATFORM 🎥🎬👀
Body: Hi Virasisog, yeah I get your point, but what if we get to a point where content is legally available so quick and so cheap that would not be an incentive to use the illegal sites? Also, our core object is to reduce online piracy by 80% in the next 10 years. We understand that eliminating piracy altogether would be nearly impossible. We want to reduce to a point where independent film and tv producers can keep making movies, because they are getting return on investment.  So, attacking not the viewers for pirating, but giving them a real quick, cheap option, whilst taking legal action to eliminate illegal content found online.

Author: aybeeplus
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VENTANA :: P2P ANTI-PIRACY SEARCH & DISTRIBUTION PLATFORM 🎥🎬👀
Body: Ventana Token Sale - Bounty Campaign  We are delighted to release the first phase of the Veredictum Marketing Bounty Campaign. Our Crytocurrency token, VENTANA (VNT), is the subject of our Token Sale.  You can see in the Veredictum cyrptocurrency model, we have allowed for 10m VENTANA tokens to be used for marketing purposes. To support our Token Sale, we will make available 20% of the marketing tokens for supporters and promoters of our project. As a result:  Veredictum Marketing Campaign Pool = 2,000,000 VNT tokens  The Marketing Bounty Campaign will run until the close of the Veredictum Token Sale — September 11, 2017 08:59 am UTC.  How will the Marketing Campaign Pool work?  1. Marketing Bounty members sign up for the individual social media channels they wish to be involved with and will be rewarded in VNT Tokens that will be allocated once we have completed a successful Token Sale.  2. We will allocate VNT tokens against targeted activities within our main social media channels:  3. Below, you will see the individual criteria for you to qualify for each of the social media channels and the rewards available for each of the channels and its targeted activities.  4. The list of members for each channel will be updated and analyzed once a week and posted on our website.  5. Each member will be rewarded with Ventana Bounty Points every week based on their performance in each social media channel. When the Veredictum Token Sale period is finished the Bounty Pools for each channel will be distributed among all campaign participants by the number of Ventana Bounty Points each member has earned.  6. The reward will be in VNT Tokens.  Please note: Bounty Campaign members who use inappropriate methods such as spam and “artificial/robotic” likes and shares will be excluded from the Campaign Pool and will NOT receive the rewards. We are rewarding only those that generate genuine engagement for the Veredictum project.  Veredictum YouTube Bounty Pool — 300,000 tokens  Because we are re-thinking film and video distribution, video is an essential part of our marketing activities. We have produced great content and we want to spread it far and wide.  The Rules: Each member must subscribe on the official Veredictum YouTube Page here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCC0xM8-98iMZfgm0ueKj22w To qualify for the bounty pool, each member should make at least 3 comments per week on the videos and repost the video links on their social media pages during the campaign period. (Warning: NO Spam comments will be allowed. If you post spam comments you will be removed from the bounty campaign) Each participant should make a short video reviewing the Veredictum project — maximum two minutes and share it with your social media followers.  Please note the best review video as judged by the Veredictum team at their sole discretion at the end of the Token Sale will be rewarded with 2,500 VNT tokens  >>>> Sign Up for the Veredictum YouTube Bounty here: http:// bit (dot) ly /YTVNTb  Veredictum’s Blog Pool — 300,000 tokens  We will produce regular daily, high quality material.  Rules: Each participant should subscribe on the official Veredictum Medium page — our blog: https://medium.com/veredictum Each participant should like (or they call it a clap on Medium) all our content, which will be put up daily Each participant should share the Medium content to your social media accounts — twitter and facebook. To qualify for the pool you must make at least 5 claps per week  >>>> Sign Up for the Veredictum Blog Bounty here: http:// bit (dot) ly /BlogVNT  Veredictum BitcoinTalk Signature Bounty Campaign –300,000 VNT tokens  Rules:  Each participant should update their signature in their BitcoinTalk profile based on their user ranks. You can find the signature codes here — Bitcoin signatures are currently being designed. To qualify for the bounty each participant should make at least 50 publications outside of the Veredictum BitcoinTalk Thread during the Token Sale campaign period. (Warning: NO Spam comments allowed, or you will be removed from the campaign) The publications need to be done at least once per week.  >>>> Sign Up for the Veredictum Bitcointalk Signature Bounty here: http:// bit (dot) ly /BTTSigVNT  Veredictum Bitcointalk Translation Bounty Campaign — 300,000 VNT tokens  Veredictum’s Translation Bounty Pool will be run on BitcoinTalk.org and supporting threads.  Rules: Each participant must be a profile rank of at least “Jr. Member” Each participant should translate the BitcoinTalk.org Veredictum ICO Thread, Whitepaper, create a National Veredictum thread on BitcoinTalk, and publish the translation as well. To qualify for the bounty each participant should make at least 3 posts per day in the Veredictum Thread.  Following languages are welcomed: Spanish, French, Italian, German, Chinese (Traditional), Japanese, Korean, Indonesian, Russian, Polish, and Hindi (We are open to suggestions for other languages)  >>>> Sign Up for the Veredictum Bitcointalk Translation Bounty Campaign here: http:// bit (dot) ly /BTTTnNVT  Veredictum Facebook Bounty Campaign Campaign –200,000 VNT tokens  Rules:  Each participant of the Facebook Bounty should have at least 200 friends Each participant should “Follow” and “Like” the official Veredictum Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/Veredictum To qualify for the bounty, each member must re- post at least one of Veredictums posts every 3 days and like all the posts shared by Veredictum during the campaign period.  >>>> Sign Up for the Veredictum Facebook Bounty Campaign here: http:// bit (dot) ly /FbVNTb  Veredictum Twitter Bounty Campaign — 200,000 VNT tokens  Rules:  Each participant of the Twitter Bounty should have at least 150 followers Each participant should “Follow” the official Veredictum Twitter page: https://www.twitter.com/Veredictumio To qualify for the bounty, each participant must retweet at least one of Veredictum’s posts every day. Each participant must create an original post from their own account and tag @veredictumio with a link to our ICO http://tokensale.veredictum.io. Must use hashtags #changethegame #ventanatoken  >>>> Sign Up for the Veredictum Twitter Bounty Campaign here: http:// bit (dot) ly /TwtrVNT  Veredictum Reddit Bounty Campaign — 200,000 VNT tokens  Rules:  Each participant of the reddit bounty should have a minumum of 100 comments and link karma Each participant should subscribe to the official Ventana sub Reddit http://reddit.com/r/ventanatoken Each participant should upvote on the official Ventana Reddit Thread To qualify each participant should make at least 10 comments per week on the thread. (Warning: NO Spam comments allowed, you will be removed from the campaign)  >>>> Sign Up for the Veredictum Reddit Bounty Campaign here: http:// bit (dot) ly /redtVNT  Veredictum’s Winners’ Enclosure — 100,000 VNT tokens  The Winners’ enclosure pool is for the top 3 performing members of our Bounty programme:  #1 — whoever has the highest number of Bounty points at the end of the Token Sale 60% of the pool #2 — whoever has second highest number of Bounty points at the end of the Token Sale gets 25% of the pool #3- whoever has third highest number of Bounty points at the end of the Token Sale gets 15% of the pool 5%   Veredictum’s Extra Mile Prize Pool — 100,000 VNT tokens  The “extra-mile” prize, as determined by the Veredictum team for an individual member (or collection of members) who have shown the greatest effort to go that extra mile to furthering the values of Veredictum. This prize will be offered at Veredictum’s sole discretion  We’d like to welcome you to the Veredictum Marketing Bounty Pool. Let us know if you have questions.

Author: aybeeplus
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VENTANA :: P2P ANTI-PIRACY SEARCH & DISTRIBUTION PLATFORM 🎥🎬👀
Body: Ventana Token Sale  The platform that will forever change the film industry. Veredictum's vision is to reduce online film and video piracy by 80% over the next ten years – but it can’t be done with the stick alone – it also needs the carrot. We are building technology that allows for easier access to content and at price points that are fair, as well as improving the deterrents to catch pirates. Combined we are committed to solve the piracy problem … permanently.  Sale starts Monday 14 August 9:00 UTC Buy at https://tokensale.veredictum.io <-- If link does not work, please copy and paste the URL to your browser  Token Sale Summary Minimum Target:$ 2.0m Core Target: $ 7.5m Stretch Target (Hard Cap): $ 20.0m Total Issuance (no more tokens will be issued): 300,000,000 Projected Sale Price (USD): $ 0.35  Only about 69M coins will be sold at the token sale - for full info please check the cryptoeconomic model paper   TECHNOLOGY OVERVIEW Veredictum is developing a generalised technology toolset to tackle digital piracy. Initially, our technology was developed with video in mind, however our products are also useful in combatting other modes of piracy. Our technology revolves around our belief that if we: 1. Improve deterrent technology, and 2. Provide on-demand access at a reasonable price-point, Then piracy can be brought under control, and greater value can flow through to content creators to ultimately produce better content and lower prices.   https://daks2k3a4ib2z.cloudfront.net/590694783c6c844c055b3349/5990407f153f32000199c2ed_cap1-btpost.PNG https://daks2k3a4ib2z.cloudfront.net/590694783c6c844c055b3349/5990407ffda8db00018418aa_cap2-btpost.PNG    View Technical Overview PDF (5 pages) Business Overview PDF (12 pages) Cryptoeconomic Model PDF (5 pages) Introductory Whitepaper PDF English (12 pages) View Technical Whitepaper PDF (40 pages)   The Team  https://daks2k3a4ib2z.cloudfront.net/590694783c6c844c055b3349/5990407f90707d00013c5b95_cap3-btpost.PNG   Our Advisors  https://daks2k3a4ib2z.cloudfront.net/590694783c6c844c055b3349/5990407ffda8db00018418a9_cap4-btpost.PNG  Social Channels  YouTube Twitter Facebook LinkedIn Instagram  Interested in inspecting our contract code? Connect with the tech team on Telegram

Author: alexpro401
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VENTANA :: P2P ANTI-PIRACY SEARCH & DISTRIBUTION PLATFORM 🎥🎬👀
Body: How are you going to catch pirates if the world has a Torrent?

Author: aybeeplus
Title: [ANN] [ICO] VENTANA :: P2P ANTI-PIRACY SEARCH & DISTRIBUTION PLATFORM 🎥🎬👀
Body: Hi Alex, thanks for your question. Our platform will provide a search network for online content. Streaming now accounts for about 75% of pirated content Mind you, our objective is stop illegal streaming, but we also plan to offer timely and fairly priced content distribution, which according to preliminary research will hit the biggest drivers for piracy: availability (or lack thereof) and high price.
